Bash("/c/Program Files/R/R-4.5.2/bin/Rscript.exe" -e "
devtools::load_all\(\)
readRenviron\(''C:/Users/alexfarach/OneDrive - Microsoft/Documents/.Renviron''\)

cat\(''--- Testing hf_classify ---\\n''\)
result <- hf_classify\(''I love using R for data science!''\)
print\(result\)

cat\(''\\n--- Testing hf_fill_mask ---\\n''\)
result <- hf_fill_mask\(''The capital of France is [MASK].'', top_k = 3\)
print\(result\)

cat\(''\\n--- Testing hf_embed ---\\n''\)
result <- hf_embed\(''Hello world''\)
cat\(''Embedding dims:'', result$n_dims, ''\\n''\)

cat\(''\\nAll tests passed!\\n''\)
")

Bash("/c/Program Files/R/R-4.5.2/bin/Rscript.exe" -e "
devtools::load_all\(\)
cat\(''Testing hf_load_dataset with auto-detected config...\\n''\)
result <- hf_load_dataset\(''imdb'', split = ''train'', limit = 5\)
cat\(''Success! Got'', nrow\(result\), ''rows and'', ncol\(result\), ''columns\\n''\)
cat\(''Columns:'', paste\(names\(result\), collapse = '', ''\), ''\\n''\)
cat\(''First text \(truncated\):'', substr\(result$text[1], 1, 80\), ''...\\n''\)
")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update vignettes, README, pkgdown site, and add integration tests for v2 API

Rewrite all vignettes to cover the v2 API-first interface: getting-started,
text-classification, embeddings-and-similarity, llm-chat-and-generation,
hub-datasets-and-modeling, and a new anthropic-economic-index research vignette.
Delete 6 legacy Python/reticulate vignettes. Update README.Rmd with v2 examples.
Rebuild pkgdown site with Bootstrap 5 and updated reference index. Add
scripts/test-integration.R covering all 27 API functions.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash("/c/Program Files/R/R-4.5.2/bin/Rscript.exe" -e "devtools::load_all\(quiet=TRUE\); result <- hf_embed_umap\(c\(''hello world'', ''test sentence'', ''another one'', ''fourth text'', ''fifth item''\), n_neighbors = 3\); cat\(sprintf\(''rows=%d cols=%s\\n'', nrow\(result\), paste\(names\(result\), collapse='',''\)\)\); print\(result\)")
